title: (x) Speak Up logo - hand lettered by Michael Clark {Carl Crossgrove}
author: willydslc

comments.content:
Custom made and I can swear it.

Héctor

Typophile even ‘featured’ similar requests for the ‘Speak Up’ logotype ID, in the past.. :) _( And, [Michael Clark](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Michael%20Clark), at the TypoWiki.. )_
